org.springframework.xd.analytics.ml.pmml

Class AbstractPmmlLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.xd.analytics.ml.pmml.AbstractPmmlLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PmmlLoader
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ResourcePmmlLoader

    public abstract class AbstractPmmlLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements PmmlLoader
    An abstract implementation of a PmmlLoader that can build a PMML instance form a given InputSource. Sub-classes can customize the resolving process by implementing the getPmmlText(String) method.
